chemoreception.notes: As free-living flatworms, Gnosonesimidae likely rely on chemoreception for locating food and mates. Inferred from related free-living Rhabditophora.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely possess mechanoreceptors for detecting touch and water currents. Inferred from related free-living Rhabditophora.

photoreception.notes: Presence and sophistication of photoreceptors are unknown; depends on habitat and lifestyle.
